name: Bank Statement Balance Script Report
query:
select
	 bank_account As "Bank Account",
	 ROUND(sum(opening_balance)) as "Opening Balance" ,
	 ROUND(sum(deposit) - sum(opening_balance)) as "Deposit",
     	ROUND(sum(withdrawal)) as "Withdrawal",
	 ROUND(sum(deposit) - sum(withdrawal)) as "Closing Balance"
from
	(
	select
		bank_account,
		CASE
			WHEN description = "OPENBL" THEN deposit - withdrawal
			ELSE 0
		END as opening_balance,
		deposit,
		withdrawal,
		date,
		file_upload
	from
		`tabBank Transaction Staging`)t WHERE t.date > '2023-03-31'
group by
	t.bank_account ;
